installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Velocity Proxy Installation Script
# Server Files: /mnt/server

set -euo pipefail

PROJECT="velocity"
API_BASE="https://fill.papermc.io/v3/projects/$PROJECT"

cd /mnt/server

# --- Resolve version ---
if [ -z "${VELOCITY_VERSION:-}" ] || [ "$VELOCITY_VERSION" = "latest" ]; then
    echo "Resolving latest $PROJECT version..."
    VELOCITY_VERSION=$(curl -s "$API_BASE" | jq -r '.versions | to_entries[0] | .value[0]')
fi

# --- If user supplied direct download ---
if [ -n "${DOWNLOAD_LINK:-}" ]; then
    echo "Using supplied download URL: $DOWNLOAD_LINK"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(eval echo "$DOWNLOAD_LINK" | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g')
else
    echo "Fetching builds for $PROJECT $VELOCITY_VERSION..."
    LATEST_BUILD=$(curl -s "$API_BASE/versions/$VELOCITY_VERSION" | jq -r '.builds | .[0]')
    BUILD_TO_DOWNLOAD="${BUILD_NUMBER:-$LATEST_BUILD}"

    echo "Using build $BUILD_TO_DOWNLOAD for $PROJECT $VELOCITY_VERSION"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -s "$API_BASE/versions/$VELOCITY_VERSION/builds/$BUILD_TO_DOWNLOAD" | jq -r '.downloads["server:default"].url')
fi

if [ -z "$DOWNLOAD_URL" ] || [ "$DOWNLOAD_URL" = "null" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: Could not determine download URL."
    exit 1
fi

# --- Download server jar ---
echo "Downloading Velocity $VELOCITY_VERSION (Build $BUILD_TO_DOWNLOAD)..."
[ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE:-server.jar}" ] && mv "$SERVER_JARFILE" "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old"
curl -L -o "${SERVER_JARFILE:-server.jar}" "$DOWNLOAD_URL"

# --- Config setup ---
if [ ! -f velocity.toml ]; then
    echo "Downloading default velocity.toml..."
    curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Biraru/MinecraftEggs/main/proxy/java/velocity/velocity.toml -o velocity.toml
else
    echo "velocity.toml already exists"
fi

if [ ! -f forwarding.secret ]; then
    echo "Creating forwarding.secret..."
    date +%s | sha256sum | base64 | head -c 12 > forwarding.secret
else
    echo "forwarding.secret already exists"
fi

echo "Installation complete!"

The build number for the velocity release.

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.
